name: Nuclear Disaster Simulator
description:
The ultimate nuclear oopsie survival guide brought to you by Safe haven nuclear solutions Inc.  3 player action puzzler Controls - 

Controller -

 [Left stick] - Move.  [A] - Perform actions. 

Keyboard -

[WASD] - Move.  [Q] - Perform actions. 

[YGHJ] - Move.  [B] - Perform actions. 

[ARROWS] - Move.  [SPACE] - Perform actions. 

Currently running 1080p only. 

Credits

Fidaa Naffa, Edo Binyamini, Nave Segal, Yuval Lavie, Gadi Yampel
